Load packages

```{r}
#| message: false
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(visreg)
```

Run some analysis

```{r}
iris |> 
  group_by(Species) |> 
  summarise(mean(Petal.Length))

ggplot(iris) +
  geom_jitter(aes(Species, Petal.Length, colour = Species))

model <- lm(Petal.Length ~ Species, data = iris)
visreg(model)
```
